items.name: Darwin Project Wiki
items.title: Darwin Project Wiki
items.desc: The Darwin Project is a stream-based survival game developed by Scavengers Studios. The game takes place in a dystopian post-apocalyptic landscape in the Northern Canadian Rockies. In order to prepare for the coming Ice Age, the 'Darwin Project' sets players against players in a last-man-standing battle royal arena. Battle the cold and fight to the death. Gather supplies and craft weapons, armor, and other items. This wiki is a collaborative resource for the game and is maintained by the contributions of the fans.
